design_system.name: Swiss Organic Fintech
design_system.description: A precision-focused financial interface merging Swiss typography with organic, trustworthy deep greens. Prioritizes data density and clarity.
design_system.theme_strategy: Professional Light Mode (Default) with Dark Mode Toggle

usage_rules.headings: Use Cormorant Garamond for all H1-H3. Tracking tight (-0.02em). Font weight 600 or 700.
usage_rules.body: Use Manrope for all UI text. Tracking normal.
usage_rules.numbers: Use JetBrains Mono for all financial data, prices, and P&L figures. Tabular nums.

layout.spacing: Compact but breathable. Use p-4 for cards, gap-4 for grids.

cards.style: Flat, 1px border, no shadow (or very subtle shadow-sm).

inputs.style: High contrast border. Focus ring matches primary color.
inputs.classes: h-10 rounded-md border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

tables.style: Clean rows. No vertical borders. Header uppercase and small.
tables.header_classes: text-xs uppercase tracking-wider font-semibold text-muted-foreground bg-muted/30 h-10

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use only for sticky topbar: bg-background/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-border/50.
visual_enhancers.textures: Add a subtle noise texture to the sidebar background if possible.
visual_enhancers.gradients: Avoid gradients on buttons. Use solid colors. Use subtle gradients only for chart fills.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is always legible. Use APCA standards.
accessibility.testing: All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.

login_background.usage: Side panel of the login page. Cover mode.

empty_state.usage: Empty state for bookings or clients list.

setup: Update /app/frontend/src/index.css with the provided CSS variables.
Install fonts by adding the @import to the top of index.css.
Ensure tailwind.config.js extends the theme as per the variables.
implementation_rules: Use Shadcn components for all interactive elements (Forms, Dialogs, Selects).
Customize Shadcn components to match the 'Swiss Organic' aesthetic (remove heavy shadows, use 1px borders).
For the Dashboard, use a Bento Grid layout.
For P&L Reports, use a high-density table with sortable columns.
Ensure all financial numbers are formatted with commas and 2 decimal places.
Add 'data-testid' to all buttons, inputs, and links.
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for sticky headers.
Do not apply universal transitions (transition: all).
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui.
